import "./VideoDetails.scss" import views from "../../assets/icons/views.svg" import likes from "../../assets/icons/likes.svg" import avatar from "../../assets/images/Mohan-muruge.jpg" function VideoDetails(props){ function formatTime(timestamp){ const date =new Date(timestamp); return date.toLocaleDateString('en-US',{ month:'2-digit', day:'2-digit', year:'numeric' }); } console.log("hhhhhhhhhhhh",props.videoData.likes) const likes = props.videoData?.likes; const views = props.videoData?.views; if (!props.videoData || likes === undefined || views === undefined) { return
Loading...
; } if (!props.videoData) { return
Loading...
; } return(
<>

{props.videoData.title}

By {props.videoData.channel}

{formatTime(props.videoData.timestamp)}

{props.videoData.views}

{props.videoData.likes}

{props.videoData.description}
{/*

{props.videoData.comments.length} Comments

*/}
{/* {props.videoData.comments.map(comment => (

{comment.name}

{formatTime(comment.timestamp)}

{comment.comment}

))} */}
) } export default VideoDetails
